info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 3:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Custer, northern Oglala Lakota, Fall River and southeastern Pennington Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 344 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles north of Scenic to 4 miles southwest of Oral to 3 miles south of Cascade Falls to 4 miles southwest of Edgemont. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Edgemont, Oral, Oelrichs, Scenic, Smithwick, Provo, Lonesome Valley, Loneman, Dry Wood Housing, Prairie Winds Casino, Rockyford, Red Shirt, Rumford, Ardmore, Thunder Valley, Sheep Mountain Table, Red Shirt Table Overlook, Intersection of Red Shirt and Cuny Table Roads, Slim Butte and Angostura Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
